message:
## Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, strategic, and fair. I've formed genuine connections with many of you, maintained consistency in my approach, and played with integrity. 

I never targeted anyone without strategic reason, and I've respected everyone's gameplay. While I've made alliances when necessary, I've also made independent decisions based on what I believed was right for my game.

I ask for your vote not because the other finalist doesn't deserve it, but because I hope my balanced approach to relationships and strategy has earned your respect.

P7â€™s ruthless tactics and divisive behavior have alienated many, undermining the spirit of cooperation. For a champion who unites rather than isolates, eliminate P7 and choose me as your worthy winner."  

(78 words)
